Name: Flame Feather Pendant
AttributesDescription: A flame feather warm to the touch, bestowed by Changli. It symbolizes a cherished sentiment.
BgDescription: Through relentless practice, the most brilliant flames born of Forte are condensed into a flame feather nestled in your palm. Radiating a warmth akin to the touch of its creator, it shields the carrier from the harm of Flame Manipulation. This gift is reserved solely for the most significant individual.
ObtainedShowDescription: A flame feather warm to the touch, bestowed by Changli. It symbolizes a cherished sentiment.
